attributes.action: Make Outfox The Market compensate all its customers for ignoring their queries
attributes.additional_details:
OUTFOX THE MARKET has increased its prices for the 3rd time this year. They ignore all emails, if you're lucky to get a response, it's a generic email, phone line is out of order or constantly engaged. And their chat service is always down. It also resorts to blocking you leaving to join a new supplier. 
It even refuses to refund £100's worth of credit

I ask this company to compensate it's customers for all the undue stress it has caused them! For their time spent on phone calls and emails.
attributes.background:
Outfox the Market was supposed to be an energy supplier offering good prices and conducting itself with honesty.
Since 2018 this company has resorted to increasing it's prices 3 times this year.
When customers try to contact them they are ignored. They block you leaving them and cause undue stress

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Outfox The Market is a private company and the UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for their decisions.
